seo.meta_description: See how Thompson Plumbing achieved 60x faster response times and 740% growth in after-hours conversions with AI voice agents. 485% ROI in 3 months.

problem.headline: Slow Response Times Causing Leads to Go to Competitors
problem.description: Thompson Plumbing had great technicians and excellent reviews, but they were hemorrhaging leads. With plumbers on jobs all day and a small office team, response times averaged 2 hours. For emergency plumbing calls, that was 2 hours too long.
pain_points: Average response time of 2 hours while competitors averaged 15 minutes
Only 5% of after-hours calls converted (most went to voicemail)
Emergency calls during business hours often went unanswered when staff was busy
Losing an estimated $8,000 per month to competitors who answered faster
Customer satisfaction declining due to delayed responses

key_stat.context: Almost all after-hours leads lost to voicemail

solution.headline: 24/7 AI Voice Agents with Instant Response and Emergency Routing
solution.description: Capture Client implemented AI voice agents with a focus on speed-to-lead and emergency handling. The AI was trained to identify true plumbing emergencies and route them immediately while handling routine inquiries and bookings automatically.

implementation_steps.title: Emergency Protocol Definition
implementation_steps.description: Worked with Thompson to define what constitutes a plumbing emergency: burst pipes, no water, sewage backup, major leaks. Created urgent routing rules.

implementation_steps.title: Service Training
implementation_steps.description: Trained the AI on all services offered, pricing guidelines, service areas, and common plumbing questions customers ask.

implementation_steps.title: Scheduling Integration
implementation_steps.description: Connected to ServiceTitan for real-time scheduling based on technician availability and job type.

implementation_steps.title: Escalation Setup
implementation_steps.description: Configured immediate SMS and phone alerts to on-call plumber for after-hours emergencies.

key_features: Instant call answering with natural plumbing-specific conversation
Emergency detection and immediate routing to on-call technician
Automatic scheduling based on job type and technician skills
Price estimate ranges for common jobs
Complete call transcripts and lead scoring

metrics.context: Emergency calls converted to same-day jobs

testimonial.quote: The emergency routing alone paid for the entire system in the first week. We got a burst pipe call at 2 AM on a Saturday. Our AI answered, identified it as an emergency, and had my on-call guy's phone ringing within 30 seconds. That was a $2,400 job we would have lost to whoever the customer called next. Now multiply that by every weekend.
testimonial.author: Robert Thompson
testimonial.title: Owner

milestones.milestone: First emergency successfully routed at 2 AM

key_takeaways: Response time is critical for plumbing leads - people with emergencies will not wait
After-hours emergency handling is a massive opportunity most plumbers miss
AI can reliably distinguish true emergencies from routine service requests
Customer satisfaction improved significantly with faster, more reliable response
ROI was achieved within days, not months, due to high-value emergency captures
